name: A Time of Destiny
description:
Fanfiction visual novel based on characters and settings from The Witcher, created in the festive spirit of gift-giving for my giftee in the Witcher Writers December 2022 Twitter/Tumblr event.

The basic premise is that Jaskier is in danger, so Geralt, Yennefer and Ciri need to come to the rescue with their various skills and save the day. There's an initial option to run through the story with a choice of ships: Geralt/Jaskier or Geralt/Jaskier/Yennefer. 

Please be aware that the story contains implied violence and frequent strong language, so this content is for mature audiences only and is unsuitable for minors.

This is the first time I've ever tried to create a project like this so it's fairly short, with a 10-20 minute runtime depending on reading speed.

Please also note: I do not own the rights to the original IP and this visual novel is created solely for the fan community without any monetary profit to myself or anyone else. The accompanying music is freely available for download by the composers Rafael Krux and Alexander Nakara at freepd.com. The background scenes were reworked on Krita from royalty-free stock images, and the digitally-drawn artwork is my own.
